#summary Currency is used to purchase various goods
#labels Phase-Design

= Introduction =

Currency is used to purchase various goods in an [Environment].

= Details =

  * Currency, or Gold, is accumulated the same way Experience is accumulated. (See [Level])
    * Difference between Currency and Experience: Currency can be spent (and therefore decrease) while Experience only increases over time
  * Currency can be used to buy the following:
    * [Species] to be placed in an [Environment]
    * [Research]
    * Vaccines
